TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Nsgan_Tay-wu, title = Nsgan_Tay-wu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nsgan_Tay-wu} }

S.FORM: Nsgan Tay-wu mniq kulaw tgdaya nklaan hidaw nyusan Ping-tung Taywang, quri tgdaya o kiyig nsgan Ma-cya, mskkiyig nsgan U-tay ka tqring dxgal tgdaya nklaan hidaw, quri nklaan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Cing-hung nyusan Tay-tung, quri tghunat o kiyig nsgan Ray-i, quri ryaxan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Wan-rwan. Ga mniq babaw Dgiyaq paru ka dxgal nii, dxgal nii o llbu ka ryaxan hidaw ni bbaraw ka nklaan hidaw, Seejiq klgan Py-wan Seejiq Tnpusu klwaan Tay-wang ka pusu bi ga mniq hini. Pnyahan hangan "Tay-wu" o 35 hngkawas Cyung-hwa-min-ku 1 idas phyugan alang "Tay-wu" ka Qpahun nsgan, yaasa kari alang hini o U-la-ljuc sun dha, duri ni quri nklaan hidaw o niqan dgiyaq Ta-wu, kiya ni pspuun dha mangal ka hnang kari "Ta-wu" ni "Tay-wu" do kika pthangnun "Tay-wu" da, duri ni phiyugan dha Qpahan nsgan ka alang nii. Kika ksun nsgan Tay-wu(saw aji mha mdka hangan nsgan Ta-wu nyusan Tay-tung). Pnskraya paya tmayan nsgan "Tay-wu" o "Qqpah Ka-huy", ida pnaah knlwaan Nihung siida niqan kahngkawas snduray balay do mtbiyax bi dmudug seejiq hini ka qpahan nsgan Tay-wu, phiyug "Qpuruh smbbarig". Mquri pkrana pgkla mhuma ini powsa sapuh dxgal, alang Ka-huy ungat sapuh dxgal ksun, miyah mimah ta Ka-huy dgiyaq Ta-wu miyah Tay-wu, aji uri o musa ta mkksa rmigaw qmita dgiyaq Ta-wu o malu balay. Ris Ga mniq dxgal pusu nniqan 8 paru nsgan mqdgiyaq nyusan Ping-tung ka nsgan Tay-wu nii, kiya o ga iyax tgbaraw yayung Tung-kang ni yayung Wa-rus ni ryaxan hidaw Dgiyaq paru, mnlungug bi hnigan nsgan mqdgiyaq. ga mniq iyax ayug dgiyaq tgdaya Ta-wu ni dgiyaq tghunat Tay-wu, yaasa niqan nsgan Ta-wu ka nyusan Tay-tung, babaw knlwaan Cung-hwa-min-ku do psnakun dha hangan nsgan Ta-wu da, saw nii ngalan dha hnang sbiyaw "tay". kika maa "Tay-wu" da. Nsgan Tay-wu o niqan alang Cya-ping﹑alang Wu-tan﹑alang Ping-hu, alang Cya-shing, alang Tay-wu ni alang Wan-an mataru qpahan klwaan, prajing han o nyusan Ta-kaw, 39 hnkawas Cung-hwa-min-ku ka phiyug nyusan Ping-tung do ptyusan nyusan Ping-tung bitaq sayang. Kska bi nniqan ka alang Cya-ping, aji wana dqras hnigan rhngun nsgan Tay-wu nanak, duri ni pusu nniqan Qpahan kana nsgan uri. Klwaam Mam-cing siida nnyusan Hung-san Qpahan Tay-nan, phiyug qbrangan mrata ka driq dgiyaq, knlwaan Ni-hung siida ngalang pusu Qpahan A-hug, phiyug sapah knsat ka knkingal alang muda qmpah qpahan euda alang, ttgsa﹑qqlahang hiyi, duri ni euda qmpah kklawa kana alang. Bitaq 34 hnkawas Cung-hwa-min-ku mnhdu mtgjiyal do miyah kmlawa Taywang Ku-ku-min-tu da. 35 hnkawas Cung-hwa-min-ku phiyug Qpahang nsgan Tay-wu ka Qpahan kklawa nank nyusan. Pdkaun klwaan Man-cing ni hangan alang sayang nsgan Tay-wu(nyusan Hung-san) alang Ku-a-run...........alang Tay-wu alang Maw-ss..........alang Ma-se alang Cya-u-rang..........alang Cya-ping alang Pun-ti(alang Pn-cu)..........alang Cya-sing alang Cya-cu-san..........alang Wan-an alang Se-sway-ra..........alang Wan-an Llingay dxgal Nniqan Mniq tgdaya nklaan hidaw nyusan Ping-tun klwaan Tay-wang, kiyig nsgan Ma-cya ka quri tgdaya , mskiyig nsgan Wu-tay ka bilaq tqring tgdaya nklaan hidaw iyax cicih bilaq kulaw tgdaya nklaan hidaw, , quri nklaan hidaw kiyig nsgan Cing-hung nyusan Tay-tung, quri tghunat o kiyig nsgan Ray-yi, quri ryaxan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Wan-ran. Ga babaw tgdaya Dgiyaq paru hiya, dxgal nii bbaraw ka nklaan hidaw ni llbu ka ryaxan hidaw. Knhiyi kndxgal knhiyi kndxgal nsgan nii o tqari ruahan, tqari qcinuh, ni tqari Rusang pnspuan tqari 10 kbkuy tntunan, quri lhang bnaqig dxgal hini o niqan ka mgrhibung ni mgbanah ni mgdamay uri. Hniygan dxgal Hniygan hini o tgbaraw ka quri nklaan hidaw tgtruma ka ryaxan hidaw, mttuku bika hnigan na, mndka kingal qurug. Yasaa dgiyaq Ta-wu quri hunat(2841 tnxalun kmbragan) dgiyaq Ta-wu quri tgdaya(3090 tnxalun kmbaraw) breenux Ping-tung mslagu daan qnthyaqan o 13 kbkuy tnxalun bi, paah 3.000 tnxalun dgiyaq baraw, tmabuy bitaq breenux dalih tbalay gsilung, knkingal alang ini pndka ka kmbaraw kndgakan paah gsilung , ida bi niqan paah 100 tnxalun bitaq 750 tnxalun baraw bi. Knlbangan dxgal Pnbrxan dxgal Seejiq Tnpusu o niqan 5933.487 lituk.knparu. mtduwa qqpahan nhuma o 1013.4753 lituk. dxgal djiyun qqpahan rnaaw o 4865.5012 lituk. Dxgal smlaan alang o 29.9864 lituk. Dxgal djiyun skuan bqrus 4.0633 lituk. pnseanak dxgal 0.0051 lituk. Knhbragan seejiq 104 hnkawas Cung-hwa-min-ku:5217 107 hnkawas Cung-hwa-min-ku 7 idas:5405 Ttgsa Ptasan tgska Ptasan tgska Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung Ptasan tgbilaq 1. Ptasan tgbilaq Tay-wu nsgan Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung 2. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan nsgan Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung 3. Ptasan tgbilaq Wan-an nsgan Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung 4. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan sbiq Ping-hu nsgan Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung 5. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan sbiq Cya-ping nsgan Tay-wu nyusan Ping-tung Elug hqulan Elug paru Elug nsgan Patas elug 102 nyusan Ping-tung Patas elug 106 nyusan Ping-tung Patas elug 108 nyusan Ping-tung Tdruy bahu Tdruy bahu Ping-tung Saan rmigaw qmita 1. saan rmigsw qmita rnaaw Ping-hu. 2. Ayug suyang bi qtaan. 3. Dgiyaq Ta-wu tgdaya:Tgdaya dgiyaq Ta-wu o niqan 3.090 tnxalun kndgakan paah gsilung bitaq dgiyaq, tg1 paru bi dgiyaq nyusan Ping-tung, tgswayi bi hangan ga bkgun 4. paru dgiyaq Taywang pusu tudu dgiyaq tqring bi tghunat Dgiyaq paru. 5.Dgiyaq Ta-wu tghunat:Mtduwa pspuun pddaun qmita ka iyax gsilung Tay-wang﹑iyax gsilung Pa-su ni gsilung paru. Kiya duri ni quri tghunat Taywang wana dgiyaq ququq nii hmrinas 3000 tnxalun knbaraw, pthnganun dha " bubu Ping-tung" ni "qruy Ping-tung". Kiya ni kntmaan klgan seejiq Rukai ni klgan seejiq Paiwang o nniqan Utux rudan dha ka dgiyaq Ta-wu nii. Manu saw kiya o "Dgiyaq suyang" sun dha tmngahan. tghunat dgiyaq Ta-wu o niqan 2841m. knbaraw , patas sspgan pngpung dgiyaq tg1557 ga ptmaan pusu btunux tru muhing, ga bkgun 100 hangan dgiyaq Tywang patas sspgan tg72, tg2 tgparu dgiyaq nyusan Ping-tung ka tghunat dgiyaq Ta-wu nii, mseupu dgiyaq U-thu ni dgiyaq tghunat Ta-wu o "tru pusu mteapa dxgal paru mdudul( tumuk)ka "Ta-wu". 5 Qhuni dmayi Ci-pey 6 Rwaan qsiya Wan-an 7 Qpringan tgla A-ma-wan 8 Tgla U-tan Uqun knmalu suyang phpah Rang kalat Ka-hwuy bunga qhuni ((Snakun:Truku))

Nsgan Tay-wo mniq kolaw tgdaya nklaan hidaw nyosan Ping-tong Taywang, qori tgdaya o kiyig nsgan Ma-cya, mskkiyig nsgan U-tay ka tqring dxgal tgdaya nklaan hidaw, qori nklaan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Cing-hong nyosan Tay-tong, qori tghonat o kiyig nsgan Ray-i, qori ryaxan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Wan-rwan. Ga mniq babaw Dgiyaq paro ka dxgal nii, dxgal nii o llbo ka ryaxan hidaw ni bbaraw ka nklaan hidaw, Seejiq klgan Py-wan Seejiq Tnposo klwaan Tay-wang ka poso bi ga mniq hini. Pnyahan hangan "Tay-wo" o 35 hngkawas Cyong-hwa-min-ko 1 idas phyogan alang "Tay-wo" ka Qpahon nsgan, yaasa kari alang hini o U-la-ljoc son dha, dori ni qori nklaan hidaw o niqan dgiyaq Ta-wo, kiya ni pspoon dha mangal ka hnang kari "Ta-wo" ni "Tay-wo" do kika pthangnon "Tay-wo" da, dori ni phiyogan dha Qpahan nsgan ka alang nii. Kika kson nsgan Tay-wo(saw aji mha mdka hangan nsgan Ta-wo nyosan Tay-tong). Pnskraya paya tmayan nsgan "Tay-wo" o "Qqpah Ka-hoy", ida pnaah knlwaan Nihong siida niqan kahngkawas sndoray balay do mtbiyax bi dmodog seejiq hini ka qpahan nsgan Tay-wo, phiyog "Qporoh smbbarig". Mqori pkrana pgkla mhoma ini powsa sapoh dxgal, alang Ka-hoy ongat sapoh dxgal kson, miyah mimah ta Ka-hoy dgiyaq Ta-wo miyah Tay-wo, aji ori o mosa ta mkksa rmigaw qmita dgiyaq Ta-wo o malo balay. Ris Ga mniq dxgal poso nniqan 8 paro nsgan mqdgiyaq nyosan Ping-tong ka nsgan Tay-wo nii, kiya o ga iyax tgbaraw yayong Tong-kang ni yayong Wa-ros ni ryaxan hidaw Dgiyaq paro, mnlongog bi hnigan nsgan mqdgiyaq. ga mniq iyax ayog dgiyaq tgdaya Ta-wo ni dgiyaq tghonat Tay-wo, yaasa niqan nsgan Ta-wo ka nyosan Tay-tong, babaw knlwaan Cong-hwa-min-ko do psnakon dha hangan nsgan Ta-wo da, saw nii ngalan dha hnang sbiyaw "tay". kika maa "Tay-wo" da. Nsgan Tay-wo o niqan alang Cya-ping﹑alang Wo-tan﹑alang Ping-ho, alang Cya-shing, alang Tay-wo ni alang Wan-an mataro qpahan klwaan, prajing han o nyosan Ta-kaw, 39 hnkawas Cong-hwa-min-ko ka phiyog nyosan Ping-tong do ptyosan nyosan Ping-tong bitaq sayang. Kska bi nniqan ka alang Cya-ping, aji wana dqras hnigan rhngon nsgan Tay-wo nanak, dori ni poso nniqan Qpahan kana nsgan ori. Klwaam Mam-cing siida nnyosan Hong-san Qpahan Tay-nan, phiyog qbrangan mrata ka driq dgiyaq, knlwaan Ni-hong siida ngalang poso Qpahan A-hog, phiyog sapah knsat ka knkingal alang moda qmpah qpahan eoda alang, ttgsa﹑qqlahang hiyi, dori ni eoda qmpah kklawa kana alang. Bitaq 34 hnkawas Cong-hwa-min-ko mnhdo mtgjiyal do miyah kmlawa Taywang Ko-ko-min-to da. 35 hnkawas Cong-hwa-min-ko phiyog Qpahang nsgan Tay-wo ka Qpahan kklawa nank nyosan. Pdkaon klwaan Man-cing ni hangan alang sayang nsgan Tay-wo(nyosan Hong-san) alang Ko-a-ron...........alang Tay-wo alang Maw-ss..........alang Ma-se alang Cya-o-rang..........alang Cya-ping alang Pon-ti(alang Pn-co)..........alang Cya-sing alang Cya-co-san..........alang Wan-an alang Se-sway-ra..........alang Wan-an Llingay dxgal Nniqan Mniq tgdaya nklaan hidaw nyosan Ping-ton klwaan Tay-wang, kiyig nsgan Ma-cya ka qori tgdaya , mskiyig nsgan Wo-tay ka bilaq tqring tgdaya nklaan hidaw iyax cicih bilaq kolaw tgdaya nklaan hidaw, , qori nklaan hidaw kiyig nsgan Cing-hong nyosan Tay-tong, qori tghonat o kiyig nsgan Ray-yi, qori ryaxan hidaw o kiyig nsgan Wan-ran. Ga babaw tgdaya Dgiyaq paro hiya, dxgal nii bbaraw ka nklaan hidaw ni llbo ka ryaxan hidaw. Knhiyi kndxgal knhiyi kndxgal nsgan nii o tqari roahan, tqari qcinoh, ni tqari Rosang pnspoan tqari 10 kbkoy tntonan, qori lhang bnaqig dxgal hini o niqan ka mgrhibong ni mgbanah ni mgdamay ori. Hniygan dxgal Hniygan hini o tgbaraw ka qori nklaan hidaw tgtroma ka ryaxan hidaw, mttoko bika hnigan na, mndka kingal qorog. Yasaa dgiyaq Ta-wo qori honat(2841 tnxalon kmbragan) dgiyaq Ta-wo qori tgdaya(3090 tnxalon kmbaraw) breenox Ping-tong mslago daan qnthyaqan o 13 kbkoy tnxalon bi, paah 3.000 tnxalon dgiyaq baraw, tmaboy bitaq breenox dalih tbalay gsilong, knkingal alang ini pndka ka kmbaraw kndgakan paah gsilong , ida bi niqan paah 100 tnxalon bitaq 750 tnxalon baraw bi. Knlbangan dxgal Pnbrxan dxgal Seejiq Tnposo o niqan 5933.487 litok.knparo. mtdowa qqpahan nhoma o 1013.4753 litok. dxgal djiyon qqpahan rnaaw o 4865.5012 litok. Dxgal smlaan alang o 29.9864 litok. Dxgal djiyon skoan bqros 4.0633 litok. pnseanak dxgal 0.0051 litok. Knhbragan seejiq 104 hnkawas Cong-hwa-min-ko:5217 107 hnkawas Cong-hwa-min-ko 7 idas:5405 Ttgsa Ptasan tgska Ptasan tgska Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong Ptasan tgbilaq 1. Ptasan tgbilaq Tay-wo nsgan Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong 2. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan nsgan Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong 3. Ptasan tgbilaq Wan-an nsgan Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong 4. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan sbiq Ping-ho nsgan Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong 5. Ptasan tgbilaq U-tan sbiq Cya-ping nsgan Tay-wo nyosan Ping-tong Elog hqolan Elog paro Elog nsgan Patas elog 102 nyosan Ping-tong Patas elog 106 nyosan Ping-tong Patas elog 108 nyosan Ping-tong Tdroy baho Tdroy baho Ping-tong Saan rmigaw qmita 1. saan rmigsw qmita rnaaw Ping-ho. 2. Ayog soyang bi qtaan. 3. Dgiyaq Ta-wo tgdaya:Tgdaya dgiyaq Ta-wo o niqan 3.090 tnxalon kndgakan paah gsilong bitaq dgiyaq, tg1 paro bi dgiyaq nyosan Ping-tong, tgswayi bi hangan ga bkgon 4. paro dgiyaq Taywang poso todo dgiyaq tqring bi tghonat Dgiyaq paro. 5.Dgiyaq Ta-wo tghonat:Mtdowa pspoon pddaon qmita ka iyax gsilong Tay-wang﹑iyax gsilong Pa-so ni gsilong paro. Kiya dori ni qori tghonat Taywang wana dgiyaq qoqoq nii hmrinas 3000 tnxalon knbaraw, pthnganon dha " bobo Ping-tong" ni "qroy Ping-tong". Kiya ni kntmaan klgan seejiq Rokai ni klgan seejiq Paiwang o nniqan Utox rodan dha ka dgiyaq Ta-wo nii. Mano saw kiya o "Dgiyaq soyang" son dha tmngahan. tghonat dgiyaq Ta-wo o niqan 2841m. knbaraw , patas sspgan pngpong dgiyaq tg1557 ga ptmaan poso btonox tro mohing, ga bkgon 100 hangan dgiyaq Tywang patas sspgan tg72, tg2 tgparo dgiyaq nyosan Ping-tong ka tghonat dgiyaq Ta-wo nii, mseopo dgiyaq U-tho ni dgiyaq tghonat Ta-wo o "tro poso mteapa dxgal paro mdodol( tomok)ka "Ta-wo". 5 Qhoni dmayi Ci-pey 6 Rwaan qsiya Wan-an 7 Qpringan tgla A-ma-wan 8 Tgla U-tan Uqon knmalo soyang phpah Rang kalat Ka-hwoy bonga qhoni ((Snakon:Troko))
